output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF 11240002 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Mentions Nicolae Ciucă (presidential candidate) and Ilie Bolojan, though focuses more on PNL as a party
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram - Uses inclusive language ("Împreună", "Haideți") - Addresses all Romanians and specifically the Arad community - Uses public interest topics (economy, fiscal policy)
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Clear call to vote ("Votați PNL") - Presents political platform and promises - Aims to influence voting behavior for both parliamentary and presidential elections
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly a campaign message, not journalistic content - Contains party slogans and political promises - Uses campaign-specific hashtags
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication with CMF number - Structured as a political program presentation - Paid advertisement from a political actor

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Direct calls to vote - Presents political platform - Paid distribution - Mentions presidential candidate while promoting party agenda
conclusion.message-for-police: Ucu Dima și Partidul Național Liberal, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral plătit (ID Facebook: 1242890290351940) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală pentru alegerile prezidențiale. Postarea promovează explicit candidatul Nicolae Ciucă la președinție, prezentându-l ca viitor președinte, într-un context electoral explicit, cu număr CMF 11240002, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Mesajul combină propaganda electorală pentru alegerile parlamentare cu cea pentru alegerile prezidențiale, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale prezidențiale.
